root.name: WWE WrestleMania XIX
root.description: RosterAl SnowAlberto Del RioAndre The GiantAntonio CesaroBatistaThe Big ShowBooker TBret HartBrock LesnarBrutus BeefcakeBrodus ClayBubba Ray DudleyChavo GuerreroChris BenoitChris JerichoChristopher NowinskiChristianCM PunkDaniel BryanDawn MarieDemolition AxDemolition SmashDolph ZigglerDon MuracoD-Von DudleyEddie GuerreroEdgeEvan BourneGoldbergGoldustThe Great KhaliHacksaw Jim DugganHeath SlaterHollywood Hulk HoganThe HurricaneJohn CenaKaneKurt AngleLance StormLitaMatt HardyThe MizR-TruthRandy OrtonRey MysterioRic FlairRikishiRoad Warrior AnimalRoad Warrior HawkRob Van DamThe RockRoddy PiperRybackSgt SlaughterScott SteinerShawn MichaelsStacy KeiblerStephanie McMahonSteve AustinTajiriTestTorrie WilsonTriple HTrish StratusThe UndertakerVictoriaVince McMahonWilliam RegalZack RyderRevenge ModePlayers select aWWEsuperstar or a created wrestler, who eventually joins with Stephanie McMahon in order to get revenge on her father, Vince McMahon, for firing them by attempting to ruin WrestleMania XIX. Most of the story does not take place in the ring but instead at various locations such as a skyscraper and a barge. Along the way, players must fight off multiple security guards and construction workers.
